attributes.action: Make the English parliament for the English
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now that both other member states of the union have assemblies which are empowered to Govern thier respective countries is it now time to do the same for the English and Ban all Nationalities already represented by the previously mentioned assemblies from voting on issues that directly relate to English Matters

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
